ds_grid_multiply_disk: This function will take all the values in a given disc-shaped region of the DS grid, and multiply each one by the given amount.
NOTE: This function will only work with real numbers, not strings.
The x position of the disk on the grid.
The y position of the disk on the grid.
The radius of the disk on the grid.
The value to multiply the cells within the disk with.
The above code will take all the values found within the circular grid area and multiply each one by 2.
